column4: so would installing UNR 9.04 and then upgrading from that to UNR 9.10 be possible or would it be causing myself unnecessary frustration?
I wonder why I'm having so much difficulty with this, most people seem to have a relatively easy time doing usb installs?
in fact , you can do it in these way : extract the iso ,then ,copy all the files to the usb,reboot and boot from USB
